scripts.pdf: pandoc header.md content.md footnotes.md nocite.md --filter pandoc-citeproc -o processed/paper.pdf --bibliography ../../../../Bib/DubBib.bib
scripts.latex: pandoc -s header.md content.md footnotes.md nocite.md --filter pandoc-citeproc -o processed/papertex.tex --bibliography ../../../../Bib/DubBib.bib --natbib
scripts.word: pandoc header.md content.md footnotes.md nocite.md --filter pandoc-citeproc -o processed/paper.docx --bibliography ../../../../Bib/DubBib.bib
